Verde Vibrante Sipping Broth

Herbal sipping broth packed with chayote greens, moringa, and lime leaf.

$18 8 sachets Wellness Pantry Heat: 1/5

About this product

A restorative sipping broth featuring chayote leaves, moringa, and lemongrass sourced from regenerative farms in Guanacaste. Finished with lime leaf and a touch of sea lettuce for gentle salinity, this broth is ideal for afternoon resets or post-yoga hydration.

Ingredients

  • Chayote leaf
  • Moringa
  • Lemongrass
  • Lime leaf
  • Sea lettuce
  • Pink peppercorn
  • Ginger
  • Sea salt

Dietary Notes

Functional Highlights

  • adaptogenic
